argument.description: An expression that returns a value of any built-in numeric data type.
An expression that returns a value of any built-in numeric data type.

description: The COVARIANCE function returns the (population) covariance of a set of number pairs.
sample:
COVARIANCE = SUM( 
   ( expression1 - AVG(expression1) ) * 
   ( expression2 - AVG(expression2) ) ) / COUNT(expression1)
